devc.name: devC
devc.shortInfo: A linux command line utility to build 'python venv' like reusable virtualenv from Dockerfile/Containerfile or directly from a container image. Virtualenv for containers!
devc.detailedInfo: A linux command line utility to build 'python venv' like reusable virtualenv from Dockerfile/Containerfile or directly from a container image. Virtualenv for containers!

stmp.name: STMP
stmp.shortInfo: STMP: Sitty Talky Messaging Protocol, a primitive zero-configuration local network protocol purely written in python, originally intended for tinkering with your office mates over LAN!
stmp.detailedInfo: STMP: Sitty Talky Messaging Protocol, a primitive zero-configuration local network protocol purely written in python, originally intended for tinkering with your office mates over LAN!

colbaking.name: Colbaking
colbaking.shortInfo: Nothing but an old school chrome-dino-game clone!
colbaking.detailedInfo: Nothing but an old school chrome-dino-game clone!
